p: To this end, the researchers used Cluspro-protein-docking ( www.cluspro.bu.edu) and Frodock ( http:/frodock.chaconlab.org) servers for establishing a model of SARS-CoV-2 spike and human CD26 model to predict the amino acids involved in the binding between the S1 domain and the CD26 receptor as shown in Figure 2 [ 49].
